name: Calcarus I
description:
A visual novel involving negotiating control of a planet.

The humans and the cephalons have come to blows recently over the settlement of the Calcarus system's lone planet, designated as Calcarus I. You are the hylaxian Fenwick, chairman of the Galactic Council's committee on interplanetary relations and the mediator of peace talks between the humans and the cephalons. You would rather not this come down to a war between two council members.

Unfortunately you only have two standard days to do so.
